mapper.insert: insert into lottery_config (id, red_rate, red_parity_rate, red_range_rate, red_sum_rate, consecutive_numbers_count_rate, max_consecutive_numbers_rate, type) values (#{id}, #{redRate}, #{redParityRate}, #{redRangeRate}, #{redSumRate}, #{consecutiveNumbersCountRate}, #{maxConsecutiveNumbersRate}, #{type})
mapper.update: update lottery_config set id = #{id}, red_rate = #{redRate}, red_parity_rate = #{redParityRate}, red_range_rate = #{redRangeRate}, red_sum_rate = #{redSumRate}, consecutive_numbers_count_rate = #{consecutiveNumbersCountRate}, max_consecutive_numbers_rate = #{maxConsecutiveNumbersRate}, type = #{type} where id = #{id}
